allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: swap shadow_threshold and highlight_threshold defaults

The default values for shadow_threshold (0.7) and highlight_threshold (0.3) 
were swapped, causing a ValueError in the SplitGradeSettings validator which 
requires shadow_threshold < highlight_threshold.

Changed:
- shadow_threshold: default 0.7 -> 0.3
- highlight_threshold: default 0.3 -> 0.7

Now defaults satisfy the validation constraint: 0.3 < 0.7

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
